sentences: Choi Kwang-ryul (born May 23, 1994), known by the stage name Kanto, is a South Korean rapper and composer.
He debuted as a soloist with his debut single, What You Want, on October 25, 2013.
He later debuted as a member of South Korean hip hop and R&B quartet Troy in September 2014.
He released his first EP, 14216, on September 27, 2016.
